Repping Dont Worry But Make Me A Tut And how i get positions..[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2009, 03:46:30 am[/size][hr]i mean mutli combat

item.title: How Make Make Multi Areas(repping)
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

search for “multiCombat” in client.java then you should see something like this :

public boolean multiCombat() { if((absX >= 3117 && absX <= 3128 && absY >= 3262 && absY <=3253) || (absX >= 2730 && absX <= 2745 && absY >= 3462 && absY <=3476) || (absX >= 2961 && absX <= 2971 && absY >= 3477 && absY <=3394) || (absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3221 && absY >= 3421 && absY <=3438) || (absX >= 3217 && absX <= 3226 && absY >= 3208 && absY <=3228) || (absX >= 3144 && absX <= 3184 && absY >= 3519 && absY <=3656) || (absX >= 3185 && absX <= 3350 && absY >= 3502 && absY <=3900))

Now you can either edit an already-existing coordinate or you can just add an || statment at the end and make you’re own following the previous examples. It’s pretty simple, you just get you coordinates by using the ::mypos command on you’re server and if you don’t have that command it’s also easy to add. Anyway just change the coordinates to where you want you’re multy-zone to be.

Read full topic
